name: iDTech Director
intro: Directors are the face of iD Tech to parents, students, university officials, and staff at camp. They create a FUN, SAFE environment while ensuring high-level instruction for all students. Must be an organized, experienced decision maker.

name: iDTech Instructor
intro: As role models for our students, Instructors are knowledgeable, high-energy, and passionate about technology. Through teaching, leading activities, and building relationships, iD Tech Instructors inspire the next generation of innovators.

name: iDTech Health & Safety Coordinator
intro: The well-being of our students is our highest priority. Health and Safety Coordinators personify this value by administering meds, assessing risk, and performing first aid. A willingness to help with activities and engage students is also a must.
